caption.p: Mean oil droplet density (number of oil droplets/mm 2), determined from root thin section slices of valerian. Shown are four cloned elites (CE1, CE2, CE3, CE4) ( A), two root classifications (thin- and thick-rooted) ( B), four root diameter fractions (RF1, RF2, RF3, RF4) ( C) and three horizons (HZ1, HZ2, HZ3) ( D). Further details of the cloned elites, the root classification, the root diameter fractions and horizons are shown in the text. Vertical lines: standard deviation. Significant codes: *< 0.05, **< 0.01, ***< 0.001. Different small form letters mark significant differences between the oil droplet densities ( p < 0.05, SNK). Number of root slices given in Table 2
